Name: Three Digits
About the game: Three Digits is the sequel to our first game Two Digits. The objective is simple. You are given 14 numbers less than 1000, and all you have to do is to choose two subsets with the same sum. Just try it. See how difficult it is! Features 300 puzzles, 14 level sets Random mode, generate your own levels Beautiful, calm UI Steam Achievements
Meta Title: Three Digits: Aug 14, 2015, Cleverweek and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Three Digits? Check out the release date (Aug 14, 2015), developer insights from Cleverweek, and a complete game summary.
